name: ALISGRAM
summary: The Cartonero Cabinet, made from recycled school cartons, stores small items like keys, cosmetics, and phones. This functional project promotes sustainable consumption and production patterns, aligning with SDG 12 and fostering eco-friendly practices in our school community.

name: Climate Champions
summary: Our Project showcases a unique approach to upcycling and repurposing waste materials, reducing waste and promoting sustainability.

name: David Obioma
summary: Solution: Reduction of plastic wastes for the production of portable seats, which will help reduce its contribution and effects on climate change.

name: Eco Warriors
summary: Summary of the Solutions: Creative and innovative use of waste such as pet bottles, bottle caps, plastic spoons, and cake board to  create something of beautiful value to raise awareness about waste management and sustainable practices to promote a circular economy.

name: Ikram Babs-Lawal
summary: Clean Bot is a fully automated street-cleaning robot revolutionizing urban cleanliness in Lagos. It tackles pollution, purifies air, and collects trash, using advanced sensors and manual controls. Clean Bot ensures efficient, eco-friendly urban cleanliness and safety.

name: Innovators
summary: Project Summary: The project aims to create an alternative Power Supply channel in Ikota, Nigeria, to address the high cost and scarcity of fuel for small-scale businesses. With 70% of habitats relying on generators, this solution will help enhance business prospects for small businesses that rely on power for transactions e.g. POS, phones, and gadget charging. This solution aligns with SDG 7 (Affordable and Clean Energy), which promotes access to reliable, sustainable, and modern energy for all, SDG 9 (Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure) which encourages the development and use of innovative, clean technologies, and SDG 12 (Responsible Consumption and Production) which supports the efficient use of resources and minimizes waste.

name: Mercy Akinola
summary: Solution: Solution summary: Mercy's project aims to solve the problem posed by Newspapers by finding creative and better means of re-using this household waste. Using knowledge of STEAM principles, she created a compact, firm, and sustainable product from fragile newspaper pages.

name: Oriyomi Abayomi
summary: The project aims to reduce the number of plastic bottles on water bodies by converting the covers into interior decoration items. Doing this will keep aquatic animals healthy and also safe for human consumption.

name: Premier Academy Team
summary: The Premiere Academy Teamâ€™s project features a solar-powered multipurpose agricultural robot designed for ploughing, planting, and pesticide spraying. It promotes sustainable farming, reduces greenhouse gas emissions, and integrates waste materials for construction, demonstrating innovation and environmental responsibility

name: The Globe Changers
summary: Our project aims at not just retrieving the tonnes of everyday non-biodegradable wastes which pose serious dangers to our ecosystem but also converting them to wealth by recycling them to make beautiful slabs for house decorations.

name: The Oasis Scientists
summary: The problem identified was plastic pollution in our environment and the solutions the plastic pyrolysis plant offers are, breaking down plastics with heat, thereby reducing wastes in landfills and seas, and controlling ozone layer depletion by reducing greenhouse gas emissions.
